# Julian Hilgemann - AI Engineer & Data Architect

> Portfolio and documentation for Julian Hilgemann, specializing in Power BI decision dashboards, BI systems, and analytics engineering.
> Updated: Feb 2026

## Core Pages
- [Home](/docs/index.md): Main landing page. Overview of services, philosophy, and experience.
- [Hub](/docs/hub.md): Central hub for code, projects, and contact information.
- [Page Engine](/docs/page-engine.md): Technical architecture of the "Decision Engine".
- [Imprint](/docs/impressum.md): Legal notice (Impressum).
- [Privacy Policy](/docs/datenschutz.md): Data protection and privacy policy.
- [Cookie Settings](/docs/cookie-einstellungen.md): Cookie management.

## Full Context
- [Full Documentation](/llms-full.txt): All content combined into a single file for full-context ingestion.
